meanings.definition: Having a recorded ancestry or lineage.
meanings.sent1: The cat was pedigreed, with papers showing its family tree.
meanings.sent2: The dog breeder only sold pedigreed puppies with documented lineage.
meanings.sent3: The pedigreed horse insisted on being brushed with a diamond-studded brush.
meanings.sent4: Her pedigreed necklace was passed down through generations, each gem representing a different ancestor.
meanings.sent5: The pedigreed rose bush bloomed with flowers of the purest lineage.

meanings.definition: Of a specified or particular pedigree.
meanings.sent1: The pedigreed car was a vintage model from the 1950s.
meanings.sent2: She wore a pedigreed dress designed by a famous fashion house.
meanings.sent3: The pedigreed cheese won first place at the county fair.
meanings.sent4: His pedigreed watch was a rare limited edition timepiece.
meanings.sent5: The pedigreed painting was authenticated by a renowned art expert.
